confirmMultipleDelete:
You are about to delete {0} objects. This will remove the objects from Azure Data Catalog but the data in the {0} objects will not be affected. This operation cannot be undone.

Are you sure you want to delete these {0} objects?
confirmPreviewDelete: You are about to remove the preview from "{0}". Are you sure?
confirmSingleDelete:
You are about to delete "{0}" object. This will remove the object from Azure Data Catalog but the data in the "{0}" will not be affected. This operation cannot be undone.

Are you sure you want to delete "{0}"?
userGroupsDisclaimer:
By enabling the use of security groups, the actual list of users authorized to access Data Catalog is determined based on the users that are present in the authorized groups at any given time. If this option is selected, the number of Data Catalog billing units will be adjusted based on the number of users who are members of the authorized security groups. This may in turn affect the amount that you are billed for Data Catalog. If you do not want Data Catalog to automatically adjust the billing units, please do not select this option. Instead, please authorize individual user accounts.

Please note that Azure Active Directory distribution groups are not supported for authorizing access to Data Catalog. If you use security groups that include distribution groups as members, the users from the distribution group(s) will not be authorized for access to the Data Catalog.
enableGroupsLabel: Enable authorizing Active Directory security groups to access Data Catalog and enable automatic adjustment of billing units
expiredSession: Your session has expired. Click "OK" to reload the page and re-authenticate.
iAgreeToTheTerms: i agree to the terms of use
manualEntryInvalid: Enter values for the required fields
name: name
noCommonColumns: There are no common columns for the current selection
noPreviewData: No Preview Available: A preview was not included when this data source was registered with Azure Data Catalog
noResults: Your query did not return any results. Click the button below to reset your query.
other_connectionPlaceholderText: Add information on how to connect to the entry you are creating.
pleaseSaveOrCancel: Please click save or cancel when done.
provisioningTenant: We're almost ready... Please wait while we get Azure Data Catalog ready for you.
publishBlurb: The publishing tool allows you to register your data sources in Azure Data Catalog for enrichment and discovery.
scheduledForDelete: this asset has been scheduled for deletion
noSchema: No Column Information Available: Column information was not included when this data source was registered with Azure Data Catalog. Click "Edit Columns" to add the information.
deleteSingleRowMessageFormat: You have selected to delete "{0}". This operation cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
deleteMultipleRowsMessageFormat: You have selected {0} entries for deletion. This operation cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
selectForDetails: Select an item to view its details
selectForProperties: Select an item to view its properties
settingUpCatalog: Please wait while we set up your catalog
catalogSettingTitle: Enter a name and location for your Data Catalog, and select an Azure subscription for billing. If you do not have a subscription, please create one using the Azure Usage and Billing Portal before proceeding. You must select a valid Azure subscription to complete the setup process.
getStartedLongText: To get started, enter settings for your Data Catalog, and select users you want to grant access to the Catalog. You can also select additional administrators, and can choose between the Free and the Standard Edition.
pricingSettingTitle: The selected edition determines the number of users supported and the number of data assets that can be registered.
catalogAdministratorsSettingTitle: Administrators that can manage Catalog Settings, and can add and remove users. Note that registration of groups is not yet supported.
catalogUsersSettingTitle: Users that can register, annotate, discover, and use data sources.
noSubscriptionsFound: We can't find an Azure subscription for {0} to use for your new Azure Data Catalog. Click here to manage your subscriptions
standardPricingTermsUsers: Up to  100 users per unit, includes authorization
catalogNameIsNotValid: The Data Catalog Name must be between 2 and 26 characters long consisting of letters and numbers.
invalidUsersMessageFormat: The following accounts could not be found in Azure Active Directory, and have not been added: {0}. For users, please provide the UPN (User Principal Name) of the user account. This is typically the user's primary email address. For security groups, please provide the group's display name or UPN. If you're not sure what account information to use, please contact your Active Directory administrator.
securityGroupsWithDistributionListsError:
Please note that Azure Active Directory distribution groups are not supported for authorizing access to Data Catalog. As a result, the users from the distribution group(s) you added will not be authorized for access to the Data Catalog.

The following security security groups include distribution groups: {0}
failedUsersMessageFormat: We're unable to validate the following accounts at this time: {0}. Please try again in a few minutes.
locationDisclaimer: All metadata for data sources registered with Azure Data Catalog will be stored in the selected location.
errorCreatingCatalog: An error has occured creating your Azure Data Catalog. Please try again.
errorAddingUsersCatalog: An error has occured adding users to your Azure Data Catalog. Please try again.
getAccessLongText: You are currently logged in as {0}. This account does not have permission to access Azure Data Catalog. You can log out and log in with a different account or you can request access below.
getSetupWith: Let's get you set up with
requestAccessToMicrosoftProductionCatalo: Request Access to the Microsoft Production Catalog
requestAccessToMicrosoftDemoTenant: Request Access to the Azure Data Catalog Demo Tenant
discoverMicrosoftAssets: Discover and use Microsoft corporate assets
registerMicrosoftAssets: Register and share Microsoft data sources
tagMicrosoftAssets: Tag and annotate Microsoft data assets to contribute to our data culture
demonstrateAzureDataCatalog: Demonstrate Azure Data Catalog to customers
workInSharedDemoEnvironment: Work with demo sources in a shared demo environment
noAccessLongText: Your administrator has not yet granted you access to view Azure Data Catalog. You can learn more here
requestAccessSubject: Requesting access to Azure Data Catalog
creatingCatalog: Please be patient. This may take a few minutes...
congratulationsMessage: You have successfully created your Azure Data Catalog. You can now register your enterprise data sources to make them available for others to discover and use. You can return to the Azure Data Catalog settings at any time by selecting the Settings button above.
publishMessage: The publishing tool allows you to register your data sources in Azure Data Catalog for enrichment and discovery.
welcomeMessage: You have an Azure Data Catalog, but so far no one has registered any data sources. You can get started by registering data sources now, to make them available for other Azure Data Catalog users to discover, understand, and use.
discoverDataMessage: Find and use data sources that have been registered with Azure Data Catalog.
homePageMessage1: Microsoft Azure Data Catalog is a fully managed cloud service that serves as a system of registration and system of discovery for enterprise data sources.
homePageMessage2: Azure Data Catalog provides capabilities that enable any user - from analysts to data scientists to developers - to register, discover, understand, and consume data sources.
confirmResetVisibilityBody: You are about to reset the visibility of this asset. Would you like this asset to be visible to all users?
invalidAzureSubscription: The selected Azure subscription cannot be used. Please select a subscription for which you are an owner or a contributor.
settingsLongText: Data Catalog administrators can update Catalog settings at any time.
updatingCatalog: Please be patient. This may take a few minutes...
errorUpdatingCatalog: An error has occured updating your Azure Data Catalog. Please try again.
errorFetchingPreviewData: An error has occured retrieving the preview data.
errorUpdatingUsersCatalog: An error has occured updating users of your Azure Data Catalog. Please try again.
errorFetchingColumnData: An error has occured retrieving the column data.
invalidPricingUpdate: Pricing details, including changing between Free Edition and Standard Edition and changing the number of units selected for Standard Edition, can only be changed by users who are an owner or a contributor for the selected Azure subscription.
unavailableVisibilityInfo: Visibility information is not available for data assets that are owned by others users.
invalidLogin: You've logged in using a personal Microsoft account. Azure Data Catalog only supports logging in using work or school accounts. Please log in using your work or school account to access Azure Data Catalog.
loggedInAs: You are currently logged in as {0}.
confirmUnrestrictAssetBody:
Removing all owners from a data asset will make it visible to all Data Catalog users.

Do you want to continue?
unauthorizedSubscription: Another user is currently setting up Azure Data Catalog for your organization using a subscription for which you are not an owner or a contributor.
encounteredErrorLong: Azure Data Catalog is unable to complete the operation you've requested. You can try again later, but if the error persists, please report the problem on the Azure Data Catalog forum, including the error details below. Click here to go back to Azure Data Catalog.
subcriptionSuspendedMessageLong:
The Azure subscription used for Azure Data Catalog has been disabled. This could be due to a payment failure, an expired Azure trial, or other causes.
To correct this problem, the owner of the Azure subscription can update the subscription information in the Azure portal. For additional assistance, please contact Azure support.
confirmDeleteCatalogFormat:
You are about to permanently delete the catalog "{0}" which will remove all of the catalog contents and settings. This action cannot be undone.

Are you sure you want to proceed?
saveErrorNotice: We're unable to save all of your changes. Please retry in a few minutes.
saveErrorTooLargeNoticeFormat:
We're unable to save your documentation. The maximum size allowed is {0} and the size of your documentation is {1}.

Please reduce the size of your documentation and try again.

requestAccessVerboseTooltip: Specify the email address of the user or group responsible for granting access to the data source, the URL of the documentation or tool that can be used to gain access to the data source, or the process that the user should follow to be granted access.
disjointLocationAccessWarningMessage: The data sources for the selected assets are in different locations. Are you sure you want to update the request access value for all selected assets?

giveFeedbackSubject: Sharing feedback on Azure Data Catalog
giveFeedbackBody:
Hi Azure Data Catalog team,

I'm using the Azure Data Catalog preview and would like to provide feedback on the current experience and capabilities. Here's my feedback:
getADemoSubject: Requesting a demo of Azure Data Catalog
getADemoBody:
Hi Azure Data Catalog team,

I'm using the Azure Data Catalog preview and would like to set up a demo to better understand the capabilities of the service. Here's my time zone and the time of day that would work best for a demo:
askAQuestionSubject: Asking a question about Azure Data Catalog
askAQuestionBody:
Hi Azure Data Catalog team,

I'm using the Azure Data Catalog preview and would like to ask a question that I don't see answered elsewhere. Here's my question:
